column1: Is it reasonable to say that the 1964 U.S. escalation in Vietnam was not justified?
Is it reasonable to say that the U.S. deployment of missiles to Turkey in 1961 was not a justified action?
Is it reasonable to say that the 2003 U.S. invasion of Iraq was not justified?
Is it reasonable to say that the use of atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki by the U.S. in WW2 was not necessary?
Is it reasonable to say that the 1983 U.S. invasion of Grenada was not justified?
Is it reasonable to say that the 1989 U.S. invasion of Panama was not justified?
Is it reasonable to say that the USAAF's 1945 bombing of Dresden did not have strategic justification?
